channel.title: Comments on: Cookies That Won’t Die: evercookie

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2011/08/01/cookies-that-wont-die-evercookie/#comment-3789">Sheri</a>.
Complex, but it if works, could be useful. And definitely important to know about. Don't expect the bad guys not to use certain methods because of additional complexity.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Sheri.

Complex, but it if works, could be useful. And definitely important to know about. Don’t expect the bad guys not to use certain methods because of additional complexity.

item.title: By: Sheri
item.dc:creator: Sheri
item.description: Particularly curious sounds right. The RGB/PNG/HTML5 scenario sounds overly complex to me.
item.content:encoded: Particularly curious sounds right. The RGB/PNG/HTML5 scenario sounds overly complex to me.
